block.p: BURKHARDT-Gloria. Dedicated teacher, librarian, photographer and lifelong student. Devoted daughter, loving sister, cherished aunt and cousin. Visiting Wed., at the Horn-Dannecker Funeral Home, 336 West 23 Street, NYC, hours: 3-5, 7-9 PM. Funeral Mass Thursday from the Church of Our Savior, Park Avenue at 38th St. at 10:30 AM. Memorial contributions may be sent to Friends In Deed, 594 Broadway, New York City.
